Model: Mi Redmi Note 7S Smartphone (Onyx Black, 32 GB, 3 GB RAM)
comment: Camera quality is superb, look is premium, battery can be improved, display is great, fingerprint scanner works nicely.Overall good phone in this price segment but not hardcore gaming phone besides I'm using 3gb ram variant maybe that could be another factor.I play PUBG mobile on low graphic settings so battery last long.
